g.text: Conversion passes through a reference currency
I'd like to pay Mulenga Kapwepwe
100 ZMW for her latest book, please
I want to send to MSISDN 260795390415
Yes, it's Mulenga Kapwepwe. She can receive in ZMW
Yes, it's Mulenga Kapwepwe. She can receive in ZMW
I can see that currency conversion is required.
I'm going to let the payee DFSP provide it.
Please quote for a payment of 100 ZMW.
Please quote for a transfer which sends 100 ZMW.
Hmmm. I'll need to get some currency conversion
What FXPs do you know about who do this conversion?
What FXPs do you know about
I'll ask the COMESA ZMW conversion service to perform my conversion
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
OK, so I need to figure this out...
This is an FXP which uses a reference currency.
So it overturns the proposed conversion from MWK to ZMW, and replaces
the source currency with the reference currency.
The exchange rate is simple, and there are no charges...
Now I'll set an expiry time, sign the quotation object,
create an ILPV4 prepare packet and return it in the intermediary object.
NOTE: the ILPV4 prepare packet contains the following items, all encoded:
- The amount being sent (i.e. in the source currency)
- The content of the conversion terms
The exchange rate between XUA and ZMW is 4.28/100
OK, so I will charge 2 ZMW for this.
Now I sign the transaction object
and return it to the Debtor DFSP
OK, I can see that the payee wants to be paid in XUA.
So I'll have to get some currency conversion
so I can send the correct currency.
What FXPs do you know about?
What FXPs do you know about?
I'll ask the COMESA conversion service to perform my conversion.
Nothing forces the debtor DFSP to use the same FXP;
but it does have to use an FXP which will convert
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
OK, so I need to figure this out...
This is an FXP which uses a reference currency.
So it's happy to convert to the reference currency.
The exchange rate is simple, and there are no charges...
Now I'll set an expiry time, sign the quotation object,
create an ILPV4 prepare packet and return it in the intermediary object.
NOTE: the ILPV4 prepare packet contains the following items, all encoded:
- The amount being sent (i.e. in the source currency)
- The content of the conversion terms
OK, so the effective MXK/XUA exchange rate is 6134.366/4.3656
Now I can calculate the fee in local currency
Hi, Upile: I can do the transfer.
6134.37 MWK will be deducted from your account
It'll cost you 120.28 MWK in fees
and Mulenga Kapwepwe will receive\100 ZMW.
Let me know if you want to go ahead
OK, first of all I need to get the currency that the payee DFSP wants
OK, so this is an FX confirmation.
Does the sender have an account in this currency?
Liquidity check and reserve on debtor account for this transfer
NBS_Bank has a reservation of 6134.366 MWK
Please confirm the currency conversion part of the transfer
If so, send the fulfilment back
Check fulfilment matches and cancel if not.
Sorry, your payment did not succeed.
You have not been charged for this payment.
Conversion succeeded subject to transfer success
Does the debtor hold an account in XUA? No.
Is this the currency of the source amount in the dependency? No
Make the reservation against the FXP
NBS_Bank has a reservation of 6134.366 MWK
COMESA_MWK has a reservation of 4.3656 XUA
Do I need to activate currency conversion?
Please confirm your part of the transfer
OK, so this is an FX confirmation.
Does the requester have an account in this currency?
Liquidity check and reserve on FXP account for this conversion
NBS_Bank has a reservation of 5250 MWK
COMESA_MWK has a reservation of 4.3656 XUA
COMESA_ZMW has a reservation of 102 ZMW
Please confirm the currency conversion part of the transfer
If so, send the fulfilment back
Check fulfilment matches and cancel if not.
Sorry, your payment did not succeed.
You have not been charged for this payment.
Conversion succeeded subject to transfer success
Let me check that the terms of the transfer
are the same as the ones I agreed to
Yes, they do. I approve the transfer
Transfer is confirmed, here's the fulfilment
1) Does the credit party to the transfer
have an account in the currency of the transfer?
2) If so, create an obligation between the party of the
reservation for the transfer and the crdite party
3) If not, is there a dependent transfer
whose credit party is the credit party for the transfer?
4) If so, create an obligation between the party of
and the debit party for this dependent transfer.
5) If not, this is an error.
6) For each dependent transfer associated with the main transfer:
Create an obligation between the party of the reservation
for the transfer and the counterparty to the transfer.
You can clear it in your ledgers
Let's just check: does this match the stuff I sent?
It does. Great. I'll clear the conversion
You can clear it in your ledgers
Let's just check: does this match the stuff I sent?
It does. Great. I'll clear the conversion
NBS_Bank has a debit of 5000 MWK
FDH_FX has a credit of 5000 MWK
FDH_FX has a debit of 97 ZMW
Zoona has a credit of 97 ZMW
Commit the funds in my ledgers
